オプション1: Star Man came to the See Poroporo moss garden to meet Vim.

オプション1: The moss garden wasn’t very large, so he was able to explore the whole area with just a short walk.
Vim’s entire body was white, which made him stand out in the forest—he was easy to spot.

Star Man walked toward Vim.
Vim stood completely still, staring at him.
"I came to see you because I wanted to know how the experimental subject who was with you is doing."
The man at Gip Lighthouse—Star Man had encountered him once before as well.

"I know him too.
The moment our eyes met, he tried to kill me with a blade."

"We’ve been calling you Vim.
It’s the name of a character the kids really like."
